body:
[Release 1.3.2](https://github.com/netromdk/vermin/releases/tag/v1.3.2)

Added a check for `super()` used without arguments which requires Python 3.0+.

Was based on @adamjstewart's comment [here](https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/27930#discussion_r767286150).
title: py-vermin: add latest version 1.3.2
